mapper.insert: insert into update_channel_info ( id, dic_channel_id, site_code, update_num, scan_date, create_time ) values ( #{id}, #{dicChannelId}, #{siteCode}, #{updateNum}, #{scanDate}, now() )
mapper.select:
select count(*) as blankNum, DATE_FORMAT(modify_time, '%Y-%m') as channelMonse from channel_point
1=1
and site_code like '${siteCode}%'
and modify_time BETWEEN #{beginScanDate} AND #{endScanDate}
group by DATE_FORMAT(modify_time, '%Y-%m') order by modify_time desc

select count(*) as blankNum, DATE_FORMAT(scan_date, '%Y-%m') as channelMonse from update_channel_info
group by DATE_FORMAT(scan_date, '%Y-%m') order by scan_date desc

SELECT SUM(#{pointChSum}-update_num) AS updateNum, SUBSTRING(create_time,1,7) AS returnTime FROM update_channel_info
GROUP BY SUBSTRING(create_time,1,7)

select dic_channel_id,sum(update_num) as update_num,scan_date from update_channel_info
group by dic_channel_id
